title: The Anthony Cumia Show 2015-06-29 Nick DiPaolo MP4 MP3
description:

The guys then talk about the SpaceX explosion, technological advancements in space exploration, AntÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s upcoming 4th of July party, Donald Trump, media influence, destruction of history, and go through a few stories regarding the confederate flag.
